title: RP point
body:
i'm just suggesting and thinking if riot can gift RP point for players who never purchase RP b4 ..specialy when the shops comes out  
is it possible or no ?  
thx for ur answers

replies.body: We may be able to help out if a player is looking for a very small amount of RP.  It's intended to just be enough to get grab something from the store with RP players already have, but not large enough to cover an entire item.
yeah thats what's we looking for ...a 500-750 rp is more then enough

I think you have the wrong idea about a very small amount. He probably meant an amount within 1 to 2 digits. For example, if there was a skin that I wanted that just went on sale, and I realized that I was only 12 RP away from being able to purchase it, I could submit a drawing that I made and ask for that amount to purchase the skin. 500-750 RP would be enough to purchase a full item and have leftover RP.
